segmentation.segment: Helsinki has dozens of parks and green areas which cover about 5,000 hectares in all.
Visitors can walk around Töölö Bay or down by the sea in Kaivopuisto, for example.
The Esplanade is full of life in the summer and is a favourite spot among tourists and locals alike.
On warm summer days the park is full of people who enjoy its green urban environment.
The Esplanade bandstand has plenty of programme in the summer, including jazz, blues, folk music and rock.
Jazz concerts in July are especially popular.
Performances are generally at 4.30pm Monday through Thursday and 10.30am on Saturdays.
Additional programme is also offered around lunchtime on weekdays.
The streets on both sides of the Esplanade are full of design shops and pleasant cafes and restaurants with terraces.
